languages.text:
Враг атакует торпедами! Вы можете уничтожить их до того, как они доберутся до вас.
Торпеды всегда выпускаются группой, у них нет своих {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитов{/g} или шкалы здоровья — попавшие по ним атаки уничтожают одну торпеду за выстрел.

The enemy has launched torpedoes! However, you can destroy them before they reach you.
Torpedoes are always fired in salvos, and they do not have {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} — every attack that hits a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salvo{/g} destroys one torpedo per shot.
languages.original_text:
Враг атакует торпедами! Вы можете уничтожить их до того, как они доберутся до вас.
Торпеды всегда выпускаются группой, у них нет своих {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитов{/g} или шкалы здоровья — попавшие по ним атаки уничтожают одну торпеду за выстрел.

traits.locale_text:
The enemy has launched torpedoes! However, you can destroy them before they get to you.
Torpedoes are always fired in salvos, and they do not have shields or hull integrity — every attack that hits a salvo destroys one torpedo per shot.

The enemy has launched torpedoes! However, you can destroy them before they get to you.
Torpedoes are always fired in salvos, and they do not have shields or hull integrity — every attack that hits a salvo destroys one torpedo per shot.

The enemy has launched torpedoes! However, you can destroy them before they reach you.
Torpedoes are always fired in salvos, and they do not have shields or hull integrity — every attack that hits a salvo destroys one torpedo per shot.

The enemy has launched torpedoes! However, you can destroy them before they reach you.
Torpedoes are always fired in salvos, and they do not have {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} — every attack that hits a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salvo{/g} destroys one torpedo per shot.

The enemy has launched torpedoes! However, you can destroy them before they reach you.
Torpedoes are always fired in salvos, and they do not have {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} — every attack that hits a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salvo{/g} destroys one torpedo per shot.

languages.text:
¡El enemigo ha lanzado torpedos! Sin embargo, puedes destruirlos antes de que lleguen.
Los torpedos siempre se lanzan en salvas y no tienen {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}integridad de casco{/g}: cada ataque que alcance a una {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salva{/g} destruye un torpedo por impacto.
languages.original_text:
The enemy has launched torpedoes! However, you can destroy them before they reach you.
Torpedoes are always fired in salvos, and they do not have {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} — every attack that hits a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salvo{/g} destroys one torpedo per shot.

traits.locale_text:
¡El enemigo ha lanzado torpedos! Sin embargo, puedes destruirlos antes de que lleguen.
Los torpedos siempre se lanzan en salvas y no tienen escudos ni {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}integridad de casco{/g}: cada ataque que alcance a una {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salva{/g} destruye un torpedo por {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g}.

languages.text:
敵が魚雷を発射してきた！だが、それが着弾する前に破壊することができる。
魚雷は常に一斉射撃で発射され、{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}シールド{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体の完全性{/g}はない。発射された{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}砲弾{/g}への攻撃では、各ショットにつき魚雷1本を破壊することができる。
languages.original_text:
The enemy has launched torpedoes! However, you can destroy them before they reach you.
Torpedoes are always fired in salvos, and they do not have {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} — every attack that hits a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salvo{/g} destroys one torpedo per shot.

traits.locale_text:
敵が魚雷を発射した！だが、それが到達する前に破壊することができる。
魚雷は常に一斉射撃で発射され、シールドや{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}外殻の完全性{/g}はない。{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}発射された砲弾{/g}への{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}攻撃{/g}では、各ショットにつき魚雷1本を破壊することができる。

languages.text:
敌人朝您发射了鱼雷！不过，您可以赶在鱼雷命中舰船之前将其摧毁。
鱼雷始终会以集群的方式发射。鱼雷集群没有{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}，也没有{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体完整度{/g}。每当您命中鱼雷集群时，每次射击都会摧毁一枚{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}鱼雷{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The enemy has launched torpedoes! However, you can destroy them before they reach you.
Torpedoes are always fired in salvos, and they do not have {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} — every attack that hits a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salvo{/g} destroys one torpedo per shot.

traits.locale_text:
敌人朝您发射了鱼雷！不过，您可以赶在鱼雷命中舰船之前将其摧毁。
鱼雷始终会以集群的方式发射。鱼雷集群没有护盾，也没有{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体完整度{/g}。每当您{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}鱼雷{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}集群{/g}时，每次射击都会摧毁一枚鱼雷。

languages.text:
Der Gegner hat Torpedos abgefeuert! Du kannst sie jedoch zerstören, bevor sie dich erreichen.
Torpedos werden immer in Salven abgefeuert, und sie haben keine {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schilde{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpfintegrität{/g} – jeder Angriff, der eine {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}Salve{/g} trifft, zerstört einen Torpedo pro Schuss.
languages.original_text:
The enemy has launched torpedoes! However, you can destroy them before they reach you.
Torpedoes are always fired in salvos, and they do not have {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} — every attack that hits a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salvo{/g} destroys one torpedo per shot.

traits.locale_text:
Der Gegner hat Torpedos abgefeuert! Du kannst sie jedoch zerstören, bevor sie dich erreichen.
Torpedos werden immer in Salven abgefeuert, und sie haben keine Schilde oder {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpfintegrität{/g} – jeder Angriff, der eine {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}Salve{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, zerstört einen Torpedo pro Schuss.

languages.text:
L'ennemi a lancé des torpilles ! Vous pouvez cependant les détruire avant qu'elles ne vous atteignent.
Les torpilles sont toujours tirées en salves et ne sont équipées ni de {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} ni d'{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}intégrité de coque{/g}. Chaque attaque touchant une {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salve{/g} détruit une torpille par coup.
languages.original_text:
The enemy has launched torpedoes! However, you can destroy them before they reach you.
Torpedoes are always fired in salvos, and they do not have {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} — every attack that hits a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salvo{/g} destroys one torpedo per shot.

traits.locale_text:
L'ennemi a lancé des torpilles ! Vous pouvez toutefois les détruire avant qu'elles ne vous atteignent.
Les torpilles sont toujours tirées en salves et ne sont équipés ni de boucliers ni d'{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}intégrité de coque{/g}. Chaque attaque qui {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} une {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salve{/g} détruit une torpille par tir.

languages.text:
Düşman, torpidolarını ateşledi! Ancak onları sana ulaşamadan imha etmen mümkün.
Torpidolar her daim salvolar hâlinde ateşlenir ve {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}kalkana{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}gövde bütünlüğüne{/g} sahip değildirler. Bir {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salvoyu{/g} vuran her saldırı atış başına bir torpidoyu imha eder.
languages.original_text:
The enemy has launched torpedoes! However, you can destroy them before they reach you.
Torpedoes are always fired in salvos, and they do not have {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} — every attack that hits a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salvo{/g} destroys one torpedo per shot.
